annotations.description: The flagship drink at Dante is named after Italian revolutionary Giuseppe Garibaldi, who was a central figure in the unification of Italy. Its two ingredie
annotations.title: Dante's Garibaldi Cocktail Recipe | PUNCH

textContent:
1 1/2 ounces Campari
4 ounces fresh-squeezed orange juice
Garnish: orange wedge

Build the Campari and orange juice in a small highball glass filled with ice.
Stir and garnish with the orange wedge.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/dantes-garibaldi/
title: Dante’s Garibaldi
